repository.corpname: Washington State University Libraries, Manuscripts, Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Preliminary Guide to the Washington State University Foundation Records
did.abstract: Correspondence of the WSU Foundation from 1983-1987. Correspondence with colleges within WSU as well as with individuals and alumni.

bioghist.p: Established in 1979, the WSU Foundation was created not as an object of philanthropy itself but, rather, as the preferred mechanism through which private support is raised and managed for the sole benefit of Washington State University. Since its inception, the WSU Foundation has raised more than $1.7 billion in private commitments in support of programs and initiatives across Washington State University.

scopecontent.p: 'Correspondence of the WSU Foundation from 1983-1987. Correspondence with colleges within WSU as well as with individuals and alumni. Correspondence are labeled by individuals names as well as dates. Includes tape recordings of meetings, 1983-1987

arrangement.p: This is an unprocessed collection. Any arrangement reflects either a pre-existing order from the records' creators or previous custodians, or preliminary sorting performed by staff.

All boxes contain correspondence and donor files. Box 1 contains files from January 1984/85 to April 1984/85. Box 2 contains files from April 1986-June 1986. Box 3 contains files from September 1985-November 1985. Box 4 contains files related to December 1985-March 1986. Box 5 contains files from May to August 1985. Box 6 contains media related to the foundation including but not limited to casette tapes. Some are labeled and others are not.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

prefercite.p: Preliminary Guide to the Washington State University Foundation Records, 1983-1987 (UA1989-31)
Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries, Pullman, WA.

acqinfo.p: This material was transferred to WSU Libraries' MASC by Jacki (last name unrecorded) of the Foundation on October 03, 1989 and retained as UA1989-31.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.

controlaccess.corpname: Washington State University. Foundation -- Records and correspondence
